problem_names:
lemma ntrancl_onpD_rtrancl_on:
  assumes "ntrancl_onp F r n a b" shows "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

lemma rtrancl_onE_ntrancl_onp:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" obtains n where "ntrancl_onp F r n a b"
lemma rtrancl_on_conv_ntrancl_onp: "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b)"

lemma reachableE_nreachable:
  assumes "u \<rightarrow>\<^sup>* v" obtains n where "u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v"

lemma converse_nreachable_cases[cases pred: nreachable]:
  assumes "u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v"
  obtains (ntrancl_on_0) "u = v" "n = 0" "u \<in> verts G"
    | (ntrancl_on_Suc) w m where "u \<rightarrow> w" "n = Suc m" "w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>m\<^esup> v"

lemma converse_nreachable_induct[consumes 1, case_names base step, induct pred: reachable]:
  assumes major: "u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v"
    and cases: "v \<in> verts G \<Longrightarrow> P 0 v"
       "\<And>n x y. \<lbrakk>x \<rightarrow>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> y; y \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v; P n y\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P (Suc n) x"
  shows "P n u"

lemma converse_nreachable_induct_less[consumes 1, case_names base step, induct pred: reachable]:
  assumes major: "u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v"
    and cases: "v \<in> verts G \<Longrightarrow> P 0 v"
       "\<And>n x y. \<lbrakk>x \<rightarrow>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> y; y \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v; \<And>z m. m \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> (z \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>m\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v) \<Longrightarrow> P m z\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P (Suc n) x"
  shows "P n u"
translations:
lemma ntrancl_onpD_rtrancl_on:
  assumes "ntrancl_onp F r n a b" shows "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ntrancl_onp F r n a b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
by induct (auto intro: converse_rtrancl_on_into_rtrancl_on)

lemma rtrancl_onE_ntrancl_onp:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r" obtains n where "ntrancl_onp F r n a b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>n.
        ntrancl_onp F r n a b \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
proof atomize_elim

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
show "\<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b
proof induct

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. b \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n b b
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> r; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F;
        y \<in> F; \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n y b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n x b
case base

proof (state)
this:
  b \<in> F

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. b \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n b b
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> r; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F;
        y \<in> F; \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n y b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n x b
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  b \<in> F
have "ntrancl_onp F r 0 b b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  b \<in> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ntrancl_onp F r 0 b b
by (auto intro: ntrancl_onp.intros)

proof (state)
this:
  ntrancl_onp F r 0 b b

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. b \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n b b
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> r; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F;
        y \<in> F; \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n y b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n x b
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ntrancl_onp F r 0 b b
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  ntrancl_onp F r 0 b b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n b b

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n b b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> r; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F;
        y \<in> F; \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n y b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n x b
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> r; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F;
        y \<in> F; \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n y b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n x b
case (step a c)

proof (state)
this:
  (a, c) \<in> r
  (c, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r
  a \<in> F
  c \<in> F
  \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n c b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> r; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F;

       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n x b
from \<open>\<exists>n. _\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n c b
obtain n where "ntrancl_onp F r n c b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n c b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>n.
        ntrancl_onp F r n c b \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>

this:

goal (1 subgoal):

       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n x b
with \<open>(a,c) \<in> r\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (a, c) \<in> r
  ntrancl_onp F r n c b
have "ntrancl_onp F r (Suc n) a b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, c) \<in> r
  ntrancl_onp F r n c b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ntrancl_onp F r (Suc n) a b
using  \<open>a \<in> F\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, c) \<in> r
  ntrancl_onp F r n c b
  a \<in> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ntrancl_onp F r (Suc n) a b
by (rule ntrancl_onp.intros)

proof (state)
this:
  ntrancl_onp F r (Suc n) a b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>(x, y) \<in> r; (y, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r; x \<in> F;
        y \<in> F; \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n y b\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n x b
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ntrancl_onp F r (Suc n) a b
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  ntrancl_onp F r (Suc n) a b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma rtrancl_on_conv_ntrancl_onp: "(a,b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((a, b) \<in> rtrancl_on F r) = (\<exists>n. ntrancl_onp F r n a b)
by (metis ntrancl_onpD_rtrancl_on rtrancl_onE_ntrancl_onp)

definition nreachable :: "('a,'b) pre_digraph \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> nat \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> bool" ("_ \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>_\<^esup>\<index> _" [100,100] 40) where
  "nreachable G u n v \<equiv> ntrancl_onp (verts G) (arcs_ends G) n u v"
context wf_digraph begin

lemma reachableE_nreachable:
  assumes "u \<rightarrow>\<^sup>* v" obtains n where "u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>n.
        u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  u \<rightarrow>\<^sup>* v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>n.
        u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (auto simp: reachable_def nreachable_def elim: rtrancl_onE_ntrancl_onp)

lemma converse_nreachable_cases[cases pred: nreachable]:
  assumes "u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v"
  obtains (ntrancl_on_0) "u = v" "n = 0" "u \<in> verts G"
    | (ntrancl_on_Suc) w m where "u \<rightarrow> w" "n = Suc m" "w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>m\<^esup> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk>u = v; n = 0; u \<in> verts G\<rbrakk>
             \<Longrightarrow> thesis;
     \<And>w m.
        \<lbrakk>u \<rightarrow> w; n = Suc m;
         w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>m\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk>u = v; n = 0; u \<in> verts G\<rbrakk>
             \<Longrightarrow> thesis;
     \<And>w m.
        \<lbrakk>u \<rightarrow> w; n = Suc m;
         w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>m\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> thesis
unfolding nreachable_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  ntrancl_onp (verts G) (arcs_ends G) n u v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk>u = v; n = 0; u \<in> verts G\<rbrakk>
             \<Longrightarrow> thesis;
     \<And>w m.
        \<lbrakk>u \<rightarrow> w; n = Suc m;
         ntrancl_onp (verts G) (arcs_ends G) m w v\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> thesis
by cases auto

lemma converse_nreachable_induct[consumes 1, case_names base step, induct pred: reachable]:
  assumes major: "u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v"
    and cases: "v \<in> verts G \<Longrightarrow> P 0 v"
       "\<And>n x y. \<lbrakk>x \<rightarrow>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> y; y \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v; P n y\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P (Suc n) x"
  shows "P n u"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n u
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v
  v \<in> verts G \<Longrightarrow> P 0 v
  \<lbrakk>?x2 \<rightarrow> ?y2; ?y2 \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>?n2\<^esup> v;
   P ?n2 ?y2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P (Suc ?n2) ?x2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n u
unfolding nreachable_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  ntrancl_onp (verts G) (arcs_ends G) n u v
  v \<in> verts G \<Longrightarrow> P 0 v
  \<lbrakk>?x2 \<rightarrow> ?y2;
   ntrancl_onp (verts G) (arcs_ends G) ?n2 ?y2 v; P ?n2 ?y2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P (Suc ?n2) ?x2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n u
by induct auto

lemma converse_nreachable_induct_less[consumes 1, case_names base step, induct pred: reachable]:
  assumes major: "u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v"
    and cases: "v \<in> verts G \<Longrightarrow> P 0 v"
       "\<And>n x y. \<lbrakk>x \<rightarrow>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> y; y \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v; \<And>z m. m \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> (z \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>m\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v) \<Longrightarrow> P m z\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P (Suc n) x"
  shows "P n u"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n u
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n u
have "\<And>q u. q \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> (u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> v) \<Longrightarrow> P q u"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>q u.
       \<lbrakk>q \<le> n; u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P q u
proof (induction n arbitrary: u rule: less_induct)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x q u.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y q u.
                   \<lbrakk>y < x; q \<le> y;
                    u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> P q u;
        q \<le> x; u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P q u
case (less n)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>?y2 < n; ?q2 \<le> ?y2;
   ?u2 \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>?q2\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?q2 ?u2
  q \<le> n
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x q u.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y q u.
                   \<lbrakk>y < x; q \<le> y;
                    u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> P q u;
        q \<le> x; u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P q u
show ?case

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P q u
proof (cases q)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. q = 0 \<Longrightarrow> P q u
 2. \<And>nat. q = Suc nat \<Longrightarrow> P q u
case 0

proof (state)
this:
  q = 0

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. q = 0 \<Longrightarrow> P q u
 2. \<And>nat. q = Suc nat \<Longrightarrow> P q u
with less

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>?y2 < n; ?q2 \<le> ?y2;
   ?u2 \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>?q2\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?q2 ?u2
  q \<le> n
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v
  q = 0
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?y2 < n; ?q2 \<le> ?y2;
   ?u2 \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>?q2\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?q2 ?u2
  q \<le> n
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v
  q = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P q u
by (auto intro: cases elim: converse_nreachable_cases)

proof (state)
this:
  P q u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nat. q = Suc nat \<Longrightarrow> P q u
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nat. q = Suc nat \<Longrightarrow> P q u
case (Suc q')

proof (state)
this:
  q = Suc q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nat. q = Suc nat \<Longrightarrow> P q u
with \<open>u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v
  q = Suc q'
obtain w where "u \<rightarrow> w" "w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q'\<^esup> v"

proof (prove)
using this:
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v
  q = Suc q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>w.
        \<lbrakk>u \<rightarrow> w;
         w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q'\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (auto elim: converse_nreachable_cases)

proof (state)
this:
  u \<rightarrow> w
  w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q'\<^esup> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>nat. q = Suc nat \<Longrightarrow> P q u
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  u \<rightarrow> w
  w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q'\<^esup> v
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  u \<rightarrow> w
  w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q'\<^esup> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P q u
unfolding \<open>q = _\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  u \<rightarrow> w
  w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q'\<^esup> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P (Suc q') u
using Suc less

proof (prove)
using this:
  u \<rightarrow> w
  w \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q'\<^esup> v
  q = Suc q'
  \<lbrakk>?y2 < n; ?q2 \<le> ?y2;
   ?u2 \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>?q2\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?q2 ?u2
  q \<le> n
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>q\<^esup> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P (Suc q') u
by (auto intro!: less.IH cases)

proof (state)
this:
  P q u

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  P q u

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>?q2 \<le> n; ?u2 \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>?q2\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?q2 ?u2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n u
with major

proof (chain)
picking this:
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v
  \<lbrakk>?q2 \<le> n; ?u2 \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>?q2\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?q2 ?u2
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  u \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>n\<^esup> v
  \<lbrakk>?q2 \<le> n; ?u2 \<rightarrow>\<^bsup>?q2\<^esup> v\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> P ?q2 ?u2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P n u
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  P n u

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
